attributes.action: HEAR & HELP the COVID-19 Vaccine-Damaged(not Defeated) with 1 guide across Gov.
attributes.additional_details:
The PM Kier Starmer has vowed to put the country first. We did.
The CXDL Pat McFadden works to reinstate trust in the Government. We trusted it.
The Health Secretary is tackling poor NHS services. We fought our medical emergency. We fight to access support. 
MPs in Parliament represent constituents in need. We struggle daily.
attributes.background:
Vaccines save lives. 
All medications can cause adverse reactions. Life-changing visible & invisible disabilities. 
Gov. is hostile: Primary Care, NHSBA, DWP, councils.  
We ask for one guide to oversee each case. To cut costs & duplication. To help us.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
